description:
Emergent Talent, a division of Emergent Method, is seeking a qualified and dynamic data analytics consultant to lead analytics maintenance and enhancement activities for a large client project. The data analytics consultant will oversee and execute a spectrum of analytics-related tasks, collaborating closely with client personnel and the project team. The primary focus will be on maintaining and enhancing analytics solutions, ensuring they align with the evolving needs of our clients.

The ideal candidate is experienced, self-motivated, and adept in handling various tasks related to data analytics. This individual must be flexible, able to work in a fast-paced environment and embrace the challenges of working with evolving work tasks and structures. This is a full-time, project-based, remote position with some opportunity for travel.

Key responsibilities include but are not limited to the following:
• Collaborate with clients and key stakeholders to understand their needs and develop, execute, and maintain data-based solutions and applications
• Develop, validate, and deliver ad hoc reports based on client requirements
• Collaborate with client stakeholders to define requirements for new or enhanced reports or dashboards
• Create comprehensive user stories and acceptance criteria based on stakeholder requirements
• Work closely with development team members to build, validate, and enhance dashboards, as well as troubleshoot and resolve bugs related to dashboards or ETL jobs
• Create dashboard mock-ups or prototypes using Tableau for stakeholder review
• Generate and update technical documentation for analytics solutions
• Develop and deliver training content, providing ongoing user support for the available dashboard suite
• Prepare and facilitate user acceptance testing (UAT) sessions, actively supporting UAT activities
• Ensure data integrity is upheld by performing various quality-assurance tasks
• Stay updated on trends and new products by exploring innovative opportunities to deliver custom solutions supporting client needs

Qualifications
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science, statistics, information systems, or a related field
• Three to five years of experience in designing and developing complex analytics solutions, with a minimum of one year in a lead capacity
• Proficiency in Tableau or a similar visualization tool is required
• Mid-level experience in developing and tuning SQL queries
• Proven experience in testing and validating reports and dashboards, including the creation of relevant documentation
• Strong understanding of data warehousing concepts
• Demonstrated experience working independently with user stakeholders to facilitate requirements gathering sessions and design sessions while actively supporting UAT
• Strong customer service skills with the ability to anticipate client needs
• Ability to communicate effectively with team members and clients, both written and orally
• Ability to multitask and support multiple priorities at once
• Experience in the Health and Human Services or Medicaid preferred

Background

Emergent Method is a Louisiana-based management consulting firm focused on helping companies and organizations innovate, grow, improve performance, and achieve their missions.

We do this by bringing people and ideas together to understand opportunities, let ideas emerge, and create multifaceted solutions with results greater than the sum of their parts. We come from diverse backgrounds that lend expertise in solving complex problems, implementing impactful change, helping our clients navigate shifting landscapes, and seizing opportunities – including those they had not seen before. From strategic planning and organizational design to project management and strategic communication, we are dedicated to helping our clients adapt, innovate, and grow – pushing systems, agencies, and industries to new heights while developing strategic, systemic solutions and processes to support those goals.

We opened our doors in 2012 and have been recognized for growth and achievement over the years, including Consulting Magazine’s fastest-growing consulting firms (2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022), Inc. Magazine’s fastest-growing private companies in America (2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023), LSU’s 100 fastest-growing alumni-owned business (2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023), the Louisiana Association of Business and Industry’s Company of the Year (2019), and Greater Baton Rouge Business Report’s Best Places to Work (2017, 2018, 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023).

We are dedicated to seeking the same measures of continuous improvement for our clients and supporting them in planning, growth, and emergence to the forefront of their industries. To learn more about Emergent Method and our team, visit our website at emergentmethod.com.

Emergent Method and associated entities are equal opportunity employers. We do not discriminate against employees or applicants for employment on any legally recognized basis or any protected class under federal, state, or local law.
